head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZUCKER, MILDRED F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZUCKER, MILDRED F.

block.p: ZUCKER-Mildred F., age 83. Of Margate, FL, formerly of Queens, NY, passed away July 25, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Jack Zucker. Loving mother of Enid (Stephen) Kudesh. Cherished grandmother of Michelle Kudesh, Jeremy Kudesh and Jean-Claude (Kerri) Damion. Dear sister of the late Helen Tushen and the late Gertrude Zweig. Chapel services will be Tuesday at 11:30 A.M. at Menorah Chapel, 2950 Vauxhall Road, Union, New Jersey, 908-964-1500.
